welcome_message_body: Welcome to An Najaf, a city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this charming city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Al-Ashraf International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Al-Ashraf International Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free by selecting the network and following the instructions.
